experiences.description:
Key Responsibilites:
- Responsible for recruiting and consulting right candidates in right vacancies not only internal but also partners.
- Involve in recruitment projects that is mainly related to Information technology field 
- Prepare job description, post job news, search and source candidates according to firm’s standards
- Conduct screening, phone screening CV and interview
- Follow up status of recruitment process through each round
- Manage applicant information in database in proper manner
- Maintain and develop talent pool by active database
- Work with job posting service, vendor (Careerbuilder, ITviec/Topdev…), universities to expand the recruitment channels and attract the applicants
- Broading networks, partners and candidates sources
- Update market information to follow the recruitment trend
